description: This file is a test specification for the HelloWorld Vue component, verifying that it renders correctly with given props.

methods.name: it
methods.description: Defines a test case that should verify component rendering.

methods.name: expect
methods.description: Assertion method to check if component text contains expected string.

ctags.name: wrapper
ctags.pattern: /^    const wrapper = mount(HelloWorld, { props: { msg: 'Hello Vitest' } })$/
